reviews.text: If you love brussel sprouts, this is the place to sample a local product (nearby you can see fields and fields of brussel sprouts in season).
reviews.title: Brussel Sprouts

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: More upscale than the Whale City Bakery down the street, with chic modern decor. Great service.
reviews.title: Restaurant is Tops!

reviews.text: It's that time again. Last year's Oktoberfest, organized by the Roadhouse, was so much fun! Beer, good food, live music, and a jump house for the kids. If I still lived in California, I'd be there. Enjoy it for me :)
reviews.title: Great place just outside of Santa Cruz
nice innkeeper
reviews.text: We stopped for lunch at The Roadhouse Restaurant and Inn while traveling north on PCH. We were greeting in a very friendly manner by the hostess and enjoyed excellent service. Unique and very tasty selections filled the menu. The food was fresh and excellent. Don't miss the fresh roasted Brussels Sprouts!!
